mapper.select: select productNo, productCategory, productName, productPrice, productStock, productImgPath from product
select productNo, productCategory, productName, productPrice, productStock, productImgPath from product where productNo = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: insert into product (productCategory, productName, productPrice, productStock) values (#{productCategory}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock})
insert into faq (userId, productNo, question, createdDate) values (#{userId}, #{productNo}, #{question}, now());
update faq set answer = #{answer}, replyDate = now() where faqNo = #{faqNo};
mapper.select: select filePath as uploadPath from productImg where productNo = '${productNo}' order by productImgNo
